perturbation.original_text:
3. 1. Subject to the provisions of this AGREEMENT, and with effect from the date
when the party signing last in time appends its signature to this agreement ("the
effective date"), and enduring in perpetuity unless terminated as provided for
elsewhere in this AGREEMENT, SAP AFRICA grants, and TELKOM accepts a
non-exclusive, non-transferable licence to USE the SOFTWARE,
DOCUMENTATION and other SAP AFRICA PROPRIETARY INFORMATION at
the specified DESIGNATED SITE within the TERRITORY.
perturbation.changed_text:
3. 1. Subject to the provisions of this AGREEMENT, and with effect from the date
when the party signing last in time appends its signature to this agreement ("the
effective date"), SAP AFRICA grants, and TELKOM accepts a
non-exclusive, non-transferable licence to USE the SOFTWARE,
DOCUMENTATION and other SAP AFRICA PROPRIETARY INFORMATION at
the specified DESIGNATED SITE within the TERRITORY. This license shall have a duration of exactly five years and may be terminated earlier as per the terms outlined in clause 6.2.
perturbation.explanation: The original text states the license endures 'in perpetuity unless terminated'. The modified text states the license has a duration of five years, creating a contradiction in the duration of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text:
6. 1. Duration:
The licence granted hereunder shall become effective upon execution of this
AGREEMENT by both parties and shall endure indefinitely unless terminated
under clause 6. 2.
perturbation.changed_text:
6. 1. Duration:
The licence granted hereunder shall become effective upon execution of this
AGREEMENT by both parties and shall have a term of ten years. This AGREEMENT may only be terminated under clause 6.2.
perturbation.explanation: Section 6.1 originally states the contract endures indefinitely. The modified section states it has a term of 10 years, causing conflict in the contract's duration.

perturbation.original_text:
11. 4   Subject to, and without prejudice to the provisions of this clause 11. 1 and clause
10, SAP AFRICA'S liability for any loss or damages of whatever nature or however
arising, that may be suffered by TELKOM or AFFILIATE from USE or license of the
SOFTWARE and irrespective of the number of occurrences giving rise to such
liability, shall be limited to the aggregate of all License Fees paid by TELKOM to
SAP AFRICA in terms of this AGREEMENT, up until the date when such damages
are determined or agreed.
perturbation.changed_text:
11. 4   Subject to, and without prejudice to the provisions of this clause 11. 1 and clause
10, SAP AFRICA'S liability for any loss or damages of whatever nature or however
arising, that may be suffered by TELKOM or AFFILIATE from USE or license of the
SOFTWARE and irrespective of the number of occurrences giving rise to such
liability, shall be limited to the aggregate of all License Fees paid by TELKOM to
SAP AFRICA in terms of this AGREEMENT, up until the date when such damages
are determined or agreed. However, in no instance shall SAP Africa ever be held liable to pay damages of over $5000 USD.
perturbation.explanation: Clause 11.4 initially limits liability to the sum of the license fees. By including language that states in no instance shall it go over $5000, this contradicts the original text which implies damages could be higher than $5000 if license fees paid were higher than that amount.
